original_text: Judah did evil in the eyes of the Lord. By the sins they committed they stirred up his jealous anger more than those who were before them had done.
korean_text: 유다가 여호와 보시기에 악을 행하되 그의 조상들이 행한 모든 일보다 뛰어나게 하여 그 범한 죄로 여호와를 노엽게 하였으니

sentences.original_text: in the eyes of the Lord
they stirred up his jealous anger
more than those who were before them had done
sentences.korean_translation: 그들보다 앞선 자들이 행했던 것보다 더 많이
